TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ControlBuilderInterceptor extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许自定义或控制编译过程。

span.span: Allows the compilation process to be customized or controlled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 截至2020年8月，此类还适用于 .NET Framework 2.0 和3.5。As of August 2020, this class also applies to .NET Framework 2.0 and 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ControlBuilderInterceptor 类](/dotnet/framework/additional-apis/controlbuilderinterceptor-class)。For more information, see [ControlBuilderInterceptor class](/dotnet/framework/additional-apis/controlbuilderinterceptor-class). 类是一个抽象类。The class is an abstract class. 可扩展此类的类型可以使用属性在 web.config 文件中注册 `ControlBuilderInterceptorType` 。A type that extends this class can be registered in the web.config file using a `ControlBuilderInterceptorType` property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Public Overridable Sub OnProcessGeneratedCode (controlBuilder As ControlBuilder, codeCompileUnit As CodeCompileUnit, baseType As CodeTypeDeclaration, derivedType As CodeTypeDeclaration, buildMethod As CodeMemberMethod, dataBindingMethod As CodeMemberMethod, additionalState As IDictionary)

public: virtual void OnProcessGeneratedCode(System::Web::UI::ControlBuilder ^ controlBuilder, System::CodeDom::CodeCompileUnit ^ codeCompileUnit, System::CodeDom::CodeTypeDeclaration ^ baseType, System::CodeDom::CodeTypeDeclaration ^ derivedType, System::CodeDom::CodeMemberMethod ^ buildMethod, System::CodeDom::CodeMemberMethod ^ dataBindingMethod, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ additionalState);

abstract member OnProcessGeneratedCode : System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder * System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit * System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration * System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration * System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod * System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod * System.Collections.IDictionary -> unit override this.OnProcessGeneratedCode : System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder * System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit * System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration * System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration * System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod * System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod * System.Collections.IDictionary -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: controlBuilderInterceptor.OnProcessGeneratedCode (controlBuilder, codeCompileUnit, baseType, derivedType, buildMethod, dataBindingMethod, additionalState)

param.name: codeCompileUnit
param.span: 由编译生成的 对象。

span.span: A object that is generated by the compilation.

param.name: baseType
param.span: 类或派生的类型后面的代码的类型声明。

span.span: The type declaration of the code behind class or derived type.

param.name: derivedType
param.span: 顶级标记元素的类型声明。

span.span: The type declaration of top level markup element.

param.name: buildMethod
param.span: 具有某个代码的方法，这个代码是创建控件和设置控件的各种属性、事件和字段时所必需的。

span.span: The method with the necessary code to create the control and set the control's various properties, events, fields.

param.name: dataBindingMethod
param.span: 具有某种代码的方法，这种代码用于计算控件内的数据绑定表达式。

span.span: The method with code to evaluate data binding expressions within the control.

param.name: additionalState
param.span: 一种附加状态，可用于存储和检索 类的多种方法内的数据。

span.span: The additional state which can be used to store and retrieve data within several methods of the class.

summary.span: 在 完成代码生成后调用。

span.span: Called after the has completed generating code.

public: virtual void PreControlBuilderInit(System::Web::UI::ControlBuilder ^ controlBuilder, System::Web::UI::TemplateParser ^ parser, System::Web::UI::ControlBuilder ^ parentBuilder, Type ^ type, System::String ^ tagName, System::String ^ id, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ attributes, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ additionalState);

MemberSignature.Usage: controlBuilderInterceptor.PreControlBuilderInit (controlBuilder, parser, parentBuilder, type, tagName, id, attributes, additionalState)

param.name: controlBuilder
param.span: 即将初始化的控件生成器。

span.span: The control builder which is about to be initialized.
The which was used to parse the markup.

param.name: type
param.span: 此生成器将创建的控件类型。

span.span: The type of the control that this builder will create.
The name of the tag to be built.
The ID of the element in the markup.

param.name: attributes
param.span: 标记中元素的属性列表。

span.span: The list of attributes of the element in the markup.

param.name: additionalState
param.span: 一种附加状态，可用于存储和检索 类的多种方法内的数据。

span.span: The additional state which can be used to store and retrieve data within several methods of the class.

summary.span: 在初始化标记中的元素的 前调用。

span.span: Called before the of an element in the markup is initialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `parentBuilder`参数通常是对应于标记中的父元素的生成器。The `parentBuilder` parameter is typically the builder corresponding to the parent element in the markup.
